text: Marco Blume is one of the most successful professional Magic: The Gathering players. He has won two Pro Tours and one Masters as a member of team Phoenix Foundation, his teammates being Kai Budde and Dirk Baberowski. He also won a German individually national championship in 1999. Blume is currently the Head of Sportsbook at Pinnacle Sports.http://www.sbcnews.co.uk/europe/2015/08/05/marco-blume-esports- pinnacle-strikes- first/http://www.globalgamingexpo.com/en/Contributors/1068691/Marco-Blume == Top 8 appearances == ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:German Magic: The Gathering players Category:Sportspeople from Hamburg Category:Businesspeople from Hamburg Category:German gamblers Category:Bookmakers
title: Marco Blume
